tossup_question: -  11)  – 	What stars provide a distance scale to the galaxies?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Quasars
X) Pulsars
Y) Red Giants
Z) Cepheid Variables
bonus_question: -   –  Under what circumstances could the relative humidity exceed 100% without producing condensation in the air?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) No condensation nuclei
X) Low dew point temperature
Y) Super-adiabatic lapse rate
Z) Low absolute humidity
